section.title: Description
section.p: This example implements simple freehand drawing. The example illustrates the use of RWindowBase's pointer move buffer functions: AllocPointerMoveBuffer(), EnablePointerMoveBuffer(), RetrievePointerMoveBuffer() and DisablePointerMoveBuffer().

section.title: Download
section.p: Click on the following link to download the example: PtBuffer.zip
Click: browse to view the example code.

section.title: Running on the emulator
section.p: Hold down the shift key and drag the mouse (with left mouse button down) for freehand drawing.

section.title: Running on the target phone
section.p: Hold down the shift key and draw using the pointer device.
